insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

send hortbot #foobar [HB] LevelAdmin

send hortbot #foobar [HB] LevelBroadcaster

send hortbot #foobar [HB] LevelEveryone

send hortbot #foobar [HB] LevelEveryone
